Description: For purchase of base vessel, powertrain, tanks, auxiliary equipment, etc, amortized over the vessel lifetime
Sum of CAPEX, fuel and other OPEX
Assume 14 tonnes / TEU for containerships and 3.49 lb / gal for gas carriers
Low sulfur fuel oil (main fuel for LSFO vessel and pilot fuel for other vessels)

(1/2) x (TotalEquivalentWTW for alt fuel / TotalEquivalentWTW for LSFO)
(1/2) x (TotalCost for alt fuel / TotalCost for LSFO)
Ratio in change of overall cost relative to LSFO divided by reduction in overall emissions relative to LSFO
